General.Name: Shenzhen Keybridge Communications Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Asia Link Technology Development Co.,Ltd. provides private network communication solutions in China and internationally. Its private network communication solutions are used in power grid companies; and railway transportation, as well as designs and develops software products. The company offers system, network, and highway industry products. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Keybridge Communications Co.,Ltd. Shenzhen Asia Link Technology Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Yihua Financial Technology Building, Shenzhen, China
